description: Mourners at the event in Montenegro kissed the bishop's body as it lay in an open coffin.
title: Coronavirus spreads after Covid-sceptic bishop's funeral in Montenegro
title_page: Coronavirus spreads after Covid-sceptic bishop's funeral in Montenegro - BBC News
maintext: As well as Patriarch Irinej, several other people who attended the funeral are believed to have contracted Covid-19. Amfilohije's successor, meanwhile, was said to be suffering with "mild pneumonia".
